dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents bays and estuaries in California. This file is derived from the generalized county coastline file. This layer is part of a collection of data created by the California Department of Fish & Game. These data are intended for researchers, students, policy makers, and the general public for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production. California Department of Fish and Game. Marine Resources Region. (2004). Bays and Estuaries: California, 2004. California Department of Fish and Game. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/ns227gd2773. Converted to California Teale Albers NAD83 by the California Department of Fish and Game Appropriate applications considering the scale and accuracy of the file. This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
